features: 【Unique Design & Thickened】The beautiful book vase masterfully incorporates the shape and texture of a book,blending cultural artistry with modern aesthetics, allowing it to easily adapt to any decor space. Dimensions: L5.9"xW2"xH7.9" and 8.5oz. With its side thickness increased by 25%, it's larger than similar products and can prevent tipping. Each flower vase comes with a super fine fiber cloth for convenient cleaning.

【Safe & Sturdy, Leak-proof】The adorable acrylic book vase, renowned for its high transparency, is made from high-quality acrylic material using a one-piece molding process, ensuring it won't leak water. This book vase has higher transparency than common plastic and without the worry of breakage compared to glass. It's safe and durable, lightweight yet sturdy, and has no strange odors.

【Best Gift Idea & Beautifully Packaged】The cute book vase for flowers comes beautifully gift-boxed, its unique and elegant design is deeply cherished and welcomed by a broad array of book lovers and female friends. It is perfect as a birthday gift for women, a mother's day gift for mom, on valentine's day, women's day, and other special occasions. It can also be given as a gift to daughters, friends, teachers, as well as all the book lovers.

【Aesthetic Decor】 This elegant and minimalist clear book flower vase is a multifunctional and unique way to showcase books. Whether it's on a bookshelf, desk, office table, dining table, coffee table, or windowsill, it serves as a perfect blend of fresh flowers and tabletop accessories, adding a unique decorative style to your home decor, and doesn't occupy much space.

【About This Book】The book vase is printed with the words: "The Art of Flowers As long as there are flowers in life, it is not allowed to be associated with gloom." This quote inspires us to pursue a better life and self.

【Better Service】Will provide you with a one-year quality guarantee. If you have any questions about our products, please contact us directly. We will replace it for free or give you a refund directly.美国专利：D995351S。

Unsure how to position your vase? This video shows you how to display a book flower vase in any setting. This adorable acrylic flower vase, complete with gorgeous gift packaging, is a perfect choice for gift giving. Its unique book-like design serves as an elegant adornment that can seamlessly blend with fresh flowers and other decor accessories in any scenario, adding an exclusive allure to your home ambiance. It's the ultimate choice for home decoration. I hope this video proves useful to you.
Best gifts for women book lovers,suitable for various festivals such as: mother's day, birthday, christmas, valentine’s day, thanksgiving gift ideas.

Q: Is this unique and cute book-shaped flower vase suitable as a gift? A: The cute book vase comes with a beautiful gift box packaging, making it ideal as a gift. Whether it's for female friends, mothers, daughters, teachers, or book lovers, it is sure to be welcomed and cherished. Q: Is the vase made of glass? Will there be any leakage? A:No, this flower vase is made from high-quality acrylic. We use a one-piece molding process, so you can rest assured there won't be any issues with leakage. Moreover, it is safe, durable, lightweight, and not prone to breaking. Q: Is the size of this elegant and minimalist book vase too small? A:The dimensions of this book vase are L5.9"xW2"xH7.9". It's 25% thicker on the side than ordinary book flower vases, which makes it larger in volume and more stable to prevent tipping. Q: Does this vase have any special care requirements? A:Yes. For this beautiful vase, we provide a super-fine fiber cloth. You can clean the vase with detergent, then dry it with the fiber cloth we provide. This is the best cleaning and care method we recommend after summarizing. Q: Can I place this elegant and stylish vase on my office desk for decoration? After all, it looks like a book. A：Absolutely. The vase's unique book-like design makes it a perfect decor for your bookshelf, desk, dining table, office, or anywhere you want in your home. As a book accessory, it can fit in various decor settings.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 8, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I wanted to make a flower-related DIY piece for one of my spaces and this product just so happened to pop up based on my search. It arrived packaged very nicely which I appreciated. For the DIY part, I bought fake black roses and cut them to my liking and used clear, tacky glue for the fake water and I absolutely love the results! It also has a positive message on the front of the book vase which adds a nice touch to its appearance. Definitely a satisfied customer!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 27, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Buy This!!! It’s perfect for your home, office, or even a gift!
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. I absolutely LOVE it!!! It’s acrylic-ish so do consider where you plan to place it/weight restrictions. It is small but the grooves at the top provide some balance. It’s not really made for short arrangements. I tested this $4 bouquet from the grocery store in it. I cut down the base longer than necessary the first time and they fell over a bit too much and looked thin. I trimmed another two inches or so and it’s perfect. Don’t forget to do this before plant food/water to avoid messy spills. Use a stem to stir if you like. Then place them back inside. I could have added more but I will move it to my office as it is for now. I love it so much that I just ordered 2 more and shared to my mom and best friend & they ordered one . I love that now when I receive flowers, I can excitedly pull out this vase. I love books and it’s so delicate against my maximalist aesthetic. I just needed this , a candle, & a cute mug to drink tea and start my day. My desk setup is about to be perfection!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 4, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Good vase good design
reviews.reviewText: I chose the clear one. This vase is actually a little larger and thicker than I expect, which makes sense because it is book-shaped and get steadier when it's larger. Yes, it is very steady, especially when there is water in it, and it can hold several flowers. The clear one is better for kitchen counter, but the black one could be better for study room. It would be better if they can sell several vases together as a set. The price is fair.
